name: Throne: Tower Defense
description:
Hey brave warrior!
Here on North we faced hordes of uknown EVIL. We got the wall in the past but somehow they manage to destroy it. They walk on your roads and they want to conquer your villages and cities to finally conquer the THRONE.

Dont' let them do that!

The game contains both tower defense games' elements along with the collectable cards based on comics.

Features:
• Evil bosses at the end of levels based on the north mythology
• Survival levels.
• World wide leaderboards.
• Quests for experienced users who already played tower defense games.
• Great number of cards to collect and investigate.
• Awesome locations including villages, mountains, fjords, forests and dead lands.

Struggle for thrones in the war with hordes in the tower defense strategic game!
